description:
Baby Sweet starts glowing, and the next thing he knows, Bananya is on an island where summer lasts forever. Bananya and Baby Sweet join Eternal Summer Bananya in fun activities like surfing, free diving, and beach volleyball. As they`re lounging in the sea, they see a dorsal fin cruising their way! Bananya and friends may be in trouble!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Going Tropical with an Eternal Summer Mood, Nya!
とこなつきぶんでトロピカル, にゃ!
